The color palette features a mix of bold hues, adding a lively touch that embodies an active lifestyle. item.excerpt:encoded: {"prompt":"A dynamic male model is captured in a vibrant advertisement for an online athletic wear store, showcasing a modern and stylish jogging outfit. The setting features a minimalist studio backdrop, utilizing soft, diffused lighting that accentuates the model's athletic physique and the detailed fabric of the apparel. The color palette highlights bold tones of the outfit, perhaps a striking cobalt blue or an energetic orange, creating an eye-catching contrast against the serene, neutral background. The overall atmosphere exudes energy and motivation, inviting viewers to envision an active lifestyle.nnMale model wearing jogging clothing image for a online shop. Simple background. item.title: Let me Introduce Myself
item.dc:creator: mpl_admin
item.content:encoded:
Hello there!

I have put off writing this introductory blog post for far too long. Some might even call me a champion of procrastination. But let's not dwell on that for now. Instead, allow me to properly introduce myself, albeit concisely.

Greetings once again! My name is MPL Admin (pronounced she-Rolah), and I consider myself a "full-spread" developer, primarily focusing on WordPress-related code and projects since 2008.

It all began with a project my wife and I had planned for our family business - a directory for hospitality companies in our country. After experimenting with various technologies such as ASP.NET, open-source CMSs like Joomla and Drupal (along with a few others whose names escape me), we stumbled upon WordPress. To cut a long story short, the rest, as they say, is history. Well, not entirely. Here's what followed:

In the midst of battling the economic aftermath of 2008, we had to abandon the hospitality directory project after a few years. We then ventured into creating and selling premium themes on Envato, which continued until recently (around 2020). Throughout this period, we worked on numerous client projects, all built and maintained using WordPress, and even developed a medium-sized WooCommerce shop.

After producing a dozen premium themes, developing a couple of plugins, writing thousands (if not millions) of lines of code, and handling countless support tickets, I find myself ready to embark on yet another technological transition. The Gutenberg editor arrived in WordPress a few years ago, ushering in a new era of change, while we were stuck in the "old ways of WordPress." Now, better late than never, the time has come for me to embrace this brave new future.

And so, here it is—my blog space. With time, I hope to fill this platform with articles primarily centered around development, WordPress and WooCommerce, the Blocks, Block editor, and Full Site Editing. You may also find other content related to WordPress in general.

Thank you for joining me on this journey, and I look forward to sharing my insights and experiences with you along the way.

item.title: Products layout demo
item.dc:creator: mpl_admin
item.content:encoded:
This page is a demo Products Layout block, a part of Mosaic Product Layouts plugin.
All physical products listed on this website are demo products and can't be purchased.

Simple layout with minimalist styles.

All examples on this page are created with a single block type - the Mosaic Products Layout block.

One item with separate styles, styled as a featured item.

Strong shadows on items. Featured image as background.

item.title: Mosaic Product Layouts
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Create flexible, free-form, and creative layouts for WooCommerce

Mosaic Product Layouts

WordPress Block plugin by Micemade

Mosaic Product Layouts plugin was built with an idea to provide a solution for, what we @Micemade perceived, a lack of possibilities to create stunning product layouts inside the WordPress block editor.

A base idea was to allow total control over a layout, different from "classic" product grids or listings, common in most e-Commerce sites. The idea included a desire to enable WooCommerce store owners a full control with intuitive and simple, yet powerful controls.

The result is here - we believe that Mosaic Product Layouts does just that - delivers a platform

Features

Grid based free layout creation.

Mosaic Product Layouts blocks main feature is a system for reposition, resize, adding or removing items (products, categories) free, within a layout container.

Starter layouts and styles

Predefined starter layout and styles offer a good foundation to build your own layouts and styles. This will make your layout creation and styling easier as it will provide you with a great starting point.

Save custom layouts and styles

Product styles, layout, and settings can be saved for reuse. They can be applied in the same block type, in different places - posts, pages, templates ...

Advanced product selection

Choose between listing products based on category, ordering conditions, or hand pick your products. Options can be merged - for example, show best selling products from certain categories.

Unique styles for each product

Each product in your layout can have it's own style using the same style controls used for general products style.

Single product block

Leveraging grid based layout, Mosaic Product Layouts feature build system for single products, to create unique and creative product showcases.

Create any layout

Mosaic Product Layouts uses a set of powerful yet intuitive controls for creating product layouts without limitations. Control position, text sizes, colors, z-index for each product, add as many products as you can. Our Mosaic Product Layout blocks will inspire you for many creative solutions

Check out and edit block demos:

Products Layout
Single product
